issue.title: [C++] Add CUDA build version in a public header to help prevent ABI conflicts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1399](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1399). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The version of CUDA used to build the GPU libraries should be put in a public header if possible, so that third party clients can check for ABI compatibility if they obtain the package from a package manager
